name: Polynomial2gss
body: Implementation of algorithms for the reduction of a polynomial-matrix model of a linear multivariable system to generalised-state-space form ============== Implementation of algorithms shown in http://imamci.oxfordjournals.org/content/17/1/1.abstract in python 3 using the Qt Library ## The following methods have been implemented: - Wolovich Equivalent Model - Bosgra & Van Den Weiden Equivalent Model - Tan & Vandewall Equivalent Model - Tan & Vandewall Equivalent Model (alternative algorithm) ##Running the program - To run the program download polynomial2gss.zip extract it and run launch_GUI.exe ## Compiling the code ###Required Packages: In order to compile the program you need Python 3 and the following python packages: - Sympy http://sympy.org/en/index.html - Numpy http://www.numpy.org/ - Matplolib http://matplotlib.org/ - PySide http://qt-project.org/wiki/PySide ## License MPL Â© [Tsolakis Christos]
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
